txt.en: 'The Angmarim often assault us down this path from the east. They dash from stone to stone, staying protected from our arrows until they are close. It makes defeating them a dangerous task.\n\n'Let us clear some of this rubble out of the way to make that a more difficult proposition for them. I will take it once it is gathered up. I am sure we can put it to some use.'
'I am sure we can put this to good use fortifying a position or stabilizing a building.'
The Angmarim use the rubble to hide behind when they attack, making it difficult for the Rangers to drive them off.
The rubble is just to the east of Echad Garthadir.
Orchalwë may have a use for the rubble.
